scripts.db:generate: pnpm run db:generate:sqlite && pnpm run db:generate:postgresql && pnpm run db:generate:mysql && pnpm run applyDbConfig

scripts.db:generate:sqlite: DATABASE_PROVIDER=sqlite node ./prisma/dbConfigs/applyDbConfig.ts && rm -rf ./prisma/schema/generated && prisma generate && DATABASE_PROVIDER=sqlite node ./prisma/dbConfigs/saveDbConfig.ts
